name: Hotel Axial

reviews.title: Great value and location
reviews.text: The Hotel Axial was very basic but spacious, clean, and comfortable. You can tell that it was recently renovated with a few modern amenities such as a complimentary "internet lounge," wireless internet, and a larger shower.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is located directly between the Duomo and the Uffizi which is a great spot in central Florence. Breakfast was average for a continental fare.
reviews.title: Great location, great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's website says that it is a short walk from the train station to the hotel but it is not a "short walk" at all. It certainly doesn't seem like a short walk with luggage in tow.
reviews.title: Excelllent Value, Location
Only positives
reviews.text: Again, a good value.

reviews.title: Great hotel!
reviews.text: An easy walk to everywhere, the Hotel Axial was a great place to stay in Florence. Located on the main street connecting the Duomo to the Uffizi Gallery, there is a steady stream of people walking by the hotel, yet it is quiet.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed at Hotel Axial for a week in May 2011. It was a very nice experience. It is well located, and it is quiet. The staff was friendly, courteous, and helpful. When I reserved a room, I asked the hotel to also make reservations for me at the Accademia and the Uffizi Galleries. They did so that day, at no extra charge. Once in Florence, I had to ask a similar favor for the Brancacci Chapel, and again this was done quickly. A minor fault with the room was fixed the same day. The room itself was satisfactory, though hardly fancy. The breakfast was generous. I would gladly stay here again.
reviews.title: Very nice experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: W.G., New Orleans
reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service, Courtesy Unparallelled

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Right in the heart of Florence, a 1 min walk to the Duomo. The staff was the most courteous we met in all of Italy. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: A charming hotel in a great location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: My sister and I stayed 4 nights at the Hotel Axial. The hotel is small, owned and operated by a charming, helpful family. They gave clear, easy to follow directions and recommended good, affordable restaurants. The hotel's location is ideal, the rooms are clean and the garden room is a perfect place to visit with other guests. Breakfst is more than adequate and the coffee is great! I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone.
reviews.title: Second Stay as Good as the First!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Possibly one of the most positive reviews one can give a hotel is to return to it when visiting the city again. Our stay at the Hotel Axial was every bit as good as the first time I had stayed there.
reviews.title: Great location and all in all very pleasant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel Axial is only 1/2 block from the Duomo, in the heart of the city. It is very clean and has a decent continental breakfast that includes hard boiled eggs, fruit, croissants, juice and coffee. (No cappacinno, meats or cheeses). The staff is friendly and helpful. The room is large, the tub/shower has no barrier - so be sure to direct the shower head towards the tub wall. The closet has limited space for hanging clothes (less than 2 feet). It was great having free internet access (2 computers available for use). Only complaint would be a weak A/C that didn't do a very good job in keeping the room cool - but this seemed to be the norm for Italy.
reviews.title: Great location, good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights. The location is brilliant, merely a few steps to the Duomo and Florence being so manageable on foot, it is centrally located to all the sights we went to (Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi, Accademia etc). It's only a 15 minute walk to the central train station.
reviews.title: Brilliant Location

likes.disliked: — Underlit bathroom and inconsistent hot water supply

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is clean and we can't find a fault with it although we wished the bathroom was better lit and the hot water would sometimes gradually turn icy cold in the midst of a shower. Brrrr... Your just have to point the shower head away and wait for it to turn hot again.
reviews.title: Superb!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The weather was cool and sometimes very cold at night during our stay, so we did not require air conditioning or a fan. It was cosy to snuggle up. :)
reviews.title: Great location!

likes.disliked: — Entryway from the street could be improved

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The breakfast is decent considering standard European fare. They had yoghurt, fruit and boiled eggs amongst the normal bread, cereal, coffee/tea and juice.
reviews.title: Loved our stay at Hotel Axial

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stay at Axial, 2 min from the Duomo, in the middle of the city.
reviews.title: In the middle of Florence

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You can put on your walking shoes and reach everything of interest from there. Ask for a quiet room. We got a large room adjacent to an atrium in the center of the building. Continental but ok breakfast. Great value for money. English speaking and very helpful staff. Try it!
reviews.title: Location, Location, Location!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We stayed in the Hotel Axial for 2 nights. First and foremost, the location of the hotel can't be beat!!!! It is literally 2 blocks from the Duomo and about 4 blocks from the Ponte Vecchio and other nearby attractions. Everything is within walking distance!
reviews.title: Super location, small room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is very lovely with very spacious rooms (probably the most spacious we've seen throughout our Italy trip). Our room was very clean and very well kept. The bathrooms had a shower which was comfortable. The only issue we found with the shower was that it had a curtain and the shower, itself, was not enclosed so you tend to wet its surroundings. In addition, the hair blowdryer wasn't the best so ladies - - BYOB (bring your own blowdryer!).
reviews.title: Perfect Spot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel service was wonderful! Each individual that worked at the hotel provided us with great directions on getting around the town and they were very pleasant to speak with (fluent in English).
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I selected this hotel based on the reviews on TripAdvisor and Expedia. I was very happy with my stay at the Hotel Axial.
reviews.title: Excellent location; outstanding staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All of my e-mails to the hotel were answered quickly and thoroughly. The hotel booked my tickets to the Uffizi and the Accademia. Each museum charges a small surcharge for a reservation (4 Euro) but it is a small price to pay so you don't have to wait in the long lines. I also went to the Bargello museum (excellent) and a reservation was not necessary.
reviews.title: Great Value, nice experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is centrally located to all the main sights. The weather in June was quite hot and it was nice to go back to the hotel and have a cold drink and freshen up. The rooms all have a small refrigerator. So you can store water, yogurt, etc., and save some money. The META grocery is close by - have the front desk staff show you on the map. The grocery store has everything you need - and the prices for bottled water were the cheapest I have seen. During the week, there were 2 fruit and vegetable vendors near this grocery store. Buy water at small grocery stores instead of cafes or gelato shops because of the cheaper price.
reviews.title: Great Location. Quiet Room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had a superior single room which was quite roomy - double bed and plenty of room to spread out and a good sized bathroom. My room faced the courtyard and it was very quiet. The housekeeping staff is excellent.
reviews.title: Great location and great price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: Breakfast starts at 7:30 a.m. Nice rolls, breads, fruit, juices, yogurt, cheese and a great cappuccino machine. Plenty of tables so you don't have to wait.
reviews.title: Outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just returned from a wonderful trip to Italy.Florence is superb-busy but very manageable.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel in a beautiful city
Great hotel
reviews.text: The Axial was a great find.Selected the hotel after reading reviews on Trip Advisor. The hotel is an easy flat walk from the train station.The location in the middle of the city a few minutes from the Duomo and the Uffizzi could not be beaten.Very pleasant English speaking staff.The rooms are spotless and very good value for money.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We would definitely stay again but for longer next time.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel; Very Helpful Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We picked this place based on the reviews and we were delighted by our choice. The hotel is in a very central location a few steps from the Duomo. Surprisingly, it is still very quiet. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was quite good and they were nice in getting me some gluten-free food prior to my arrival. I would recommend this place to my family and friends.
reviews.title: All the basics, centrally located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Hotel Axial is very centrally located. We found it to be very clean and well kept. Included breakfast was good. The rooms were quiet. What set this hotel apart from typical 3-star hotels was how helpful the staff was. They went out of their way to line up cab service for us when we were stuck at Michelangelo Piazza in a rain-storm, made museum bookings in advance for us at no charge, gave some very good restaurant recommendations, and helped with restaurant reservations. Their excellent and friendly service enhanced our stay in Florence.
reviews.title: All we could ask for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been waiting all my life to go to Florence and see all the marvels that this city holds. Hotel Axial was the choice for us as it is right in the middle of the city centre, between Duomo and Palazzo Vecchio, where we spent most of our week visiting sites, museums and buildings, or simply shopping.
reviews.title: Loved Florence and the hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The hotel is new, the people on the premises were very nice to us and gave us advice on where to go to eat or if there was something special to do. Breakfast is good, we found it appropriate for a 3 stars hotel. Rooms are nice and clean and have wi-fi internet connection, but there is also a reading room where you can access the internet through 2 computers.
reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: There is also a central court, there is no view, but we used it to chill out, reading a book or simply planning what to do for the day.
reviews.title: Very Basic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would certainly recommend the hotel, excellent position at affordable rates (for the centre of Florence).
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I couldn't have been more pleased with this hotel!! It was clean, spacious and safe. Literally steps from the famous Duomo and the Uffizi Gallery. Right in the heart of the city. Father runs the hotel, mother tends to breakfast, son and daughter man the desk...they provide a warm family atmosphere. Breakfast is diverse and plentiful (includes fresh fruit and hard boiled eggs!!!) and staff is eager to converse. I will stay in this hotel every time I go to Florence and will recommend it to all my friends.
reviews.title: avoid this hotel... not worth its location : (

likes.disliked: — nasty bathroom, rude/incompetent staff, dismal A/C...

reviews.title: Small but Superior
reviews.text: Axial is the place for you if you want to be in the heart of Florence. It has a lift which brings you to the hotel on the second level. The rooms are adequate and very clean. The beds are quite comfortable. The breakfast is very good. There is free internet usage. The best part, however is the caring staff and location to everything in Florence. My husband and I were treated very well at the Axial. A superior three star hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled solo
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hotel Axial in the heart of Florence in early October 2007 and recommend it very highly. The location couldn't be better, situated as it is about halfway between the Duomo and the Piazza della Signoria on the via dei Calzaiuoli, and just a few steps away from the Orsanmichele church. This makes it the ideal base for anything you want to do in Florence - sightseeing, visiting galleries, museums, etc. It's also within easy walking distance of the train and bus stations. Via dei Calzaiuoli is a busy shopping street and is only a short distance from other markets, such as the leather goods market. It's also surrounded by lots of restaurants, pizzerias and trattorias - so finding somewhere to dine out in the evening is not a problem.
reviews.title: Great Location & Friendly Service

likes.liked: — Friendliness of the staff and the great location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel Axial is on the first floor of the building. The rooms are clean, comfortable and a good size, considering the hotel's location in the centre of Florence. The breakfast is good - typically "continental": fresh bread rolls & croissants, cereals, coffee, tea and so on. The staff couldn't be friendlier and more helpful. The reception closes at 1a.m., which was a concern to me as I knew I wouldn't be arriving in Florence until after that. But, there was someone there to welcome me and check me in when I did finally arrive at 1.45a.m. There's also a courtyard where you can sit in the evening, as well as free internet access (very useful!). And, they will hold your luggage for you after you check out, if you want to do some last-minute shopping, or enjoy a final stroll to the Duomo, or to the Ponte Vecchio.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: Again, I highly recommend the Hotel Axial and its super-friendly staff for any visitor to Florence. I have been recommending it to all and sundry and will certainly be staying there again!!
reviews.title: I love this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wonderful staff, clean quiet room, nice size, centralized location, great Italian breakfast. We arrived by car and did not get directions from the hotel staff, so we had a difficult time locating the hotel which was our fault. It is located on a main pedestrian walkway which we drove our car thru all the people. Scary. We would definitely stay there again and highly recommend the hotel.
reviews.title: Great location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My husband and I and another couple stayed here for 7 nights in September and it was a wonderful experience! The location is the best in Florence[1 block from Duomo and 2 blocks from the Uffizi]. The rooms [#118 and 106] were very large by European standards, and the bathroom [118]was huge. Breakfast was cereals,yogurt,croissants and rolls,fruit,cheese, coffee,tea,or chocolate and was delicious! The staff was delightful and very helpful. Our window opened onto a beautiful private courtyard and there is a lounge with free Internet and magazines and books. There is also plenty of closet space with hangers and shelves. And I loved the tile floors. It was clean and very quiet and just terrific. I can't wait to go back!
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: For the price, we could not have picked a better hotel to stay at than Hotel Axial. First thing, location is awesome. It's halfway between the Duomo and Uffizi Gallery along the main pedestrian street. It allowed for coming and going, dropping off purchased items as the day went on. My room actually overlooked the street (which gives a great perspective) but made me worry their might be too much noise. That was not the case at all. The windows must be new because they completely blocked out all sound but also opened easily to get in fresh air. The staff was very friendly, spoke English very well, and had excellent suggestions of where to eat. There were two computers available to access the internet. Something I consider to be a luxury in europe. Breakfast was included but was very basic (bread, cereal, coffee, and yogurt.) It was only to be expected since Italians don't typically eat much of a breakfast.
reviews.title: Awesome....Couldn't Ask for Anything More

likes.disliked: — Forced to pick something....Breakfast was minimal but still included in the price.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was in the centre of Florence, maybe 100m away from Cathedral Piazza of Santa Maria del Fiore.The whole city was very busy being summer, but inside the hotel you couldn't hear a thing.Our room that opened to via Medici was big enough and always kept very clean.The staff at the receiption was very helpful and gave great assitance through out our stay.We had breakfast included in our booking which was a little limited, but there are so many places you can eat in the city that we didn't really mind.The internet access was working perfect.There is a small library/internet room that is also available to use for relaxing or for people who either need to wait for checking-in or have checked out, but need to kill some time before their departure.Over all we were very pleased with our stay in Hotel Axial and would recommend it to other travellers.
reviews.title: It was a lovely place to stay and would recommend it to anybody!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Great position, friendly and very helpful staff.
reviews.title: Great Position

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean and comfortable rooms.
reviews.title: Great staff, wonderful location.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Wi-fi is not great but is like many other "boutique type" hotels in Italy.
reviews.title: Perfect!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was good.
reviews.title: Home away from home

description: Only a few meters away from the Duomo, Hotel Axial is located in the very center of Florence, in Via dei Calzaiuoli, close to all the major museums and shops.Recently opened, Hotel Axial offers Newly restructured and wide, furnished in a warm and elegant way, in a classical style, fitted with modern services such as satellite TV and free wireless Internet connection, safe, hairdryer, refrigerator. Rooms with a view over via Calzaiuoli, garden area.
